about_the_game: "In your Shadow" is a Visual Novel point-and-click game that tells the story of three people: Lilly Emmett, Skyler Hasgrove, and Zachary Sorio. One night all three of their lives change in a second: Skyler is poisoned, Lilly is catfished and met with her sister's death again, and Zachary gets a fateful phone call. After teaming up to find who did these things to them, they find themselves in a life or death situation, and the player is lead through a comedic yet dramatic story with multiple endings.

content_descriptors.notes: The game may contain references to alcohol indulgence, certain violence (such as punching), gunshots, minimal blood\bruises, illnesses, and self-hate.

detailed_description:
Official Release is Here!

The official release of In Your Shadow is here. After much toil and much excitement, the creator is proud to present their visual novel, now available for download and play! The full tracks of the soundtrack will also be released on the game's youtube channel In Your Shadow Visual Novel, and you can feel free to enjoy the game to its fullest right now. If you like the game and want to, please leave a review or contact the creator in their email inyourshadowvn@gmail.com. Have fun!
